alert.note: Alert for Carlton, South St. Louis; Central St. Louis; Northern Aitkin; South Aitkin; South Itasca (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 4:31AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Itasca, northeastern Aitkin, southwestern St. Louis and northwestern Carlton Counties through 500 AM CDT... At 430 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 13 miles south of Meadow Brook, to 6 miles southeast of Jacobson, to near Palisade, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Mountain Iron and Floodwood around 445 AM CDT. Virginia and Tamarack around 450 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Gilbert, Biwabik, Cromwell and Brookston. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Carlton, South St. Louis; Central St. Louis; Northern Aitkin; South Aitkin; South Itasca
